question: 規律
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>standard</kanji> <kanji>law</kanji> is the <vocabulary>rule</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>law</vocabulary> you have to follow. With these standard laws comes <vocabulary>discipline</vocabulary>. If you don't have these it will be chaos!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
